health_tech: HIPAA compliant data storage and transmission
FHIR protocols for health data exchange

evidence.claim: Cooey Health uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure providing scalable services.
Cooey Health adheres to HIPAA standards for compliance in healthcare data handling.
Cooey supports integration with EHRs through reliable RESTful APIs and FHIR.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or EDI-related use cases found.
